alert.note: Alert for Chilton (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 4:22AM CDT until March 26 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Chilton County in central Alabama... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 422 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ashby, or 10 miles west of Jemison, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Calera, Jemison, Thorsby, Minooka Park and Waxahatchee Creek. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
